name: Melon (Loui Koutsouflakis)
description:
Hold to chop the melon, then slide to get them into the box.

Fridge Magnet Achievements:

- Get a big Perfect streak

- Launch a certain number of slices through the window

- Slide a certain number of slices behind the table

I tested this on an S8, but I'm still trying to improve the touch controls. If you try this on a different android device, let me know your experience, any feedback is greatly appreciated.
